服务器操作系统为 Ubuntu Server 16.04.1 LTS 32位 ，
默认账户为 ubuntu ，
公网ip：203.195.170.123

初始密码为 4BIddISW9XWsXnr

ubuntu su密码905380097
mysql server root密码admin
#配置环境变量时注意python2.7和python3.6的各项区别，包含python3-dev
pip和python版本对应
python和python3-dev版本对应
apt-get install nginx mysql-server gunicorn python-flask libmysqlclient-dev python-dev
pip install Flask-Script Flask-SQLAlchemy Flask-Login qiniu Flask-MySQLdb

数据库操作
mysql创建数据库test

pip
#!/usr/bin/python
# GENERATED BY DEBIAN

import sys
# Run the main entry point, similarly to how setuptools does it, but because
# we didn't install the actual entry point from setup.py, don't use the
# pkg_resources API.
from pip import main
if __name__ == '__main__':
    sys.exit(main())


用winscp软件将项目文件夹nowstagram拷贝到 /home/ubuntu/下

pstree -ap|grep gunicorn 查看进程
gunicorn -w 1 -b 0.0.0.0:8000 nowstagram:app
